lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everybody, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First and foremost, no sponsor tonight, but Sam, you said you wanted to say something?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Tonight, I'm going to perform the most important ad of my career. I'm going to advertise myself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we have no sponsor, so instead, I'm offering my services to the advertising world out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He might do this every day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you do our stuff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up, Marisha, you had some announcements to make.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And this time, it's featuring me, I'll be joining with Sam and Liam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was, when we shot that episode was really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, so you can catch that VOD, on Thursday, next Thursday.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura and Taliesin, you guys had something to talk about, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so we have been working with (gasp) McFarlane Toys! (exclaiming) For quite a while now, I'm very happy to let you know that our figure-- I don't want to say what it is yet-- is available in the US and the UK stores right now!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You may notice his two scimitars, that's what they're called, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) It's very well packaged, and actually, our box art is so beautiful, the whole thing is!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taliesin gave notes every single step of the way, and just really, like-- everything is based on canon, and his ideas for what the character looks like, and it's just amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you to McFarlane Toys, check out this limited edition Molly figurine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all it took the whole time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool, I think that is the end of our announcements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You separated yourselves to head around the island of Urukayxl and the Inkclaw Reef, making your way towards Rumblecusp, where you had planned in the near future, to hold Traveler Con.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, within the tangled tree mass-- What? What did I miss?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should have told them to hide or some shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This half-elf female, tan of skin, sun-bleached, long, wild hair, with a leg made of vines, it looks like, steps down onto the ground, and approaches before saying, "Welcome, so what brings you here?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment of silence comes over as everyone is now waiting with baited breath to hear what the newcomers have to say.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not your god, but it's our god named the Traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But this is your reason for coming, you say?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm afraid none of us were familiar with Rumblecusp prior to landing here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But good news is, the Traveler is super cool, and super likable, and everybody that meets him thinks he's really great, so I'm sure Vokodo will like him, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also got chased here by a giant turtle, I don't know if that's relevant, but it's all I've been thinking about for a while now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was like a moving island.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we gave chase, we got way away from it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just definitely looking for us, but--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which of you speak Elven? Anybody here speak Elven?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you still have Tongues activated?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, not activated, but I have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are to stay, we can give you shelter to sleep, "and we can get to know each other, "over a roaring fire, here safe in our village."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We would graciously accept your hospitality.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said "safe." Is it become much more dangerous when the sun goes down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, what do you mean? Like, from where?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we haven't come straight here, we were actually just east of Urukayxl, before arriving at this island, just west, southeast, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've lost many through the generations "to some of these hazards, "predators, but so long as the scouting and hunting parties "are keeping watch, "and I am able to defend this village, "we endure "under the light of our god."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said "through the generations," do mind if we ask how long you've been on this island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I myself have only been for close to three decades, "personally, but we've had at least 10-11 generations, "I believe, since the village began."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And where were you before being on the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But in the long run, that's not as important, anyway."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember, like, any locations at all in general? Or do you just not remember where you're from? Like, does anything exist outside of the island here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, the greater world of Exandria, yes."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you gather, rather rapidly, that probably not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you yourself remember why you came to this island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But for whatever reasons we come here, "some go, but most stay."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So if you wanted to leave, you could leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're not keeping you here, by any means."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who was the last person who left, that you can remember?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the idea, based on the reactions, you especially, and you both being generally very insightful folk, these are questions, or attempts at recollection that probably don't happen too often, or haven't for a very long time, and so they're in the midst of preparing to answer and then realizing they don't have one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was the level of sincerity on "Of course you can leave"?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're certainly interested in you assembling your quorum, not to be too forward, your deity, this Vokodo, are they a benevolent god, are they interested in meeting outsiders, or is it more of an inner-circle type of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I myself make treks to and from the interior of the mountain "to meet with Vokodo fairly often, "and it's between these--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are caverns woven, plants, a place of life, "brimming with creation within, "within the midst of that, is where Vokodo is."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you think if your triumvirate would agree to our proposal, that you would also need permission from Vokodo itself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be the only permission you require."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We will await Terra before we can make "such sweeping decisions."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We make all our decisions together, and usually Caleb decides, though, because he's sort of the leader of the group.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm curious to know, are you aware of any other peoples on this island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: symbols, or older symbols of Darktow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could you elaborate on what you mean by that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Structures strange, and not from anywhere in Exandria "that I've encountered or can recall."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Many strange locations, "but there are many strange locations in Exandria, yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long would you say it would take to get to some of these places? Can you walk around the whole island in a day, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It also depends on how many are going, "and under what means, because "you want to remain safe and remain unseen."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those beasts that Pono and Jaina helped, "Jahna," "Jayna"?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But Pono, right, I wrote that down right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pono! Are there more of those types of beasts out there, or are there all manner of dangerous creatures as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, there are more of those, and all manner of beasts, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you always been able to use vines like that? Was that a thing that was given to you here, or what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you mean, like use vines how?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I've always known how to do this, "just as they've always known "how to embrace the animalistic nature," and points over towards Jaina and Pono, as you pointed them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So this place is like the Bermuda Triangle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I was thinking, too!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Island of Dr. Moreau? No. This is much better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are grateful, and we'll do anything in our power to return the favor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go to Vokodo, like, personally, and ask permission? Or is that something you're going to do for us, or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For me being but an intermediary, "I worry there might be details lost in translation, "as I myself do not fully understand the nature "of what it is you ask."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's pretty confusing, so I guess it would make sense that-- What kind of stuff does Vokodo like?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And are they of the benevolent variety, or more wrathful, as a deity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just like any creature, "there is light and there is dark."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And in the past, though not in my time, "when such things were put to the wayside, "wrath could occur."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is it that you tend to feed Vokodo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vokodo does not eat, but "amasses the bounty."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess we're going to have to go to the Winding Cove, and get some gems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We might have some on our personal ready.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it doesn't, like, have to be locally sourced, or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you now realize all of you, in the ways that you dress, and the armor and equipment, and magical enchantments that you carry, very much stand out like a sore thumb by comparison.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast detect magic really quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing, except for what's on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we stop and think about it, can we recall how long it took us to get from the beach to where we are now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Precisely! Four hours, 36 minutes, and 13 seconds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give or take a few seconds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we haven't gotten hazy on how long we've been away from the beach?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You two! You're like of a mind, it's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long did it take you to be here before you, like, lost your memory? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think what she means is-- no, that's what she means.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long were you here before you started forgetting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is when they eat our faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe it's a slow, natural element, "but I don't think "it's a refined science."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you all are happy here, it seems.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well," and she opens her hands a bit, and everyone around nods.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this is a very impressive village, this is just amazing, I was going to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lukash is like, "Well, thank you very much, "we take a lot of pride what we've established here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh you should, this is great, I wish I had something like this back at home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, just stay a while, and see if, "no pressure, but this is a grand community, "filled with wonderful people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where we are on the island, is there a-- are we able to see down and in the direction of the beach that we left the ship at? Are we up on the side of the island at all? Any kind of a--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're in a raised area, but the tree cover here, the jungle trees go from, like, 100-200 or more feet up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah, all you can view is the elements of the mountain that manage to peek through, in the afternoon light, and that's about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see, probably about a dozen or so children.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's good. They don't eat babies, that's good, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I thought maybe that was, like, they're precious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, is there a place we can freshen up before din-din?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you're lead into it, you can see waiting off to the side, there's a family of dwarves that are just nodding to you and ushering you in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've got friends to shack up with."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can have our own tent, we have tents!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's our honor! "Please, it's an honor to have you stay here tonight."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And we stay here most times, "if anything, it'll be nice "to have a bit of a change of pace."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lukash, this is of course extremely generous, is there anything we can do to help for the evening's festivities? We can be of service.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're good cooks, and we have some spices and teas and things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So that would wondrous! "We have some performing bards among you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we have a band called, I think it's Yasha and the Orphan Makers, is that what?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, yes, but we are short a member of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can just scream along with the music, because that's what it sounded like anyway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it's just not the same.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we're not short a flautist, we're short a flaut, a flute, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, flautist is alive and well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe they have something that you could play? We could definitely provide some entertainment to thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And for those who wish to help with the meal "I can introduce you to Anola, who handles the mass cooking "for the village."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love to see what it is that everybody eats out here, I'm always excited by new food.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're still waiting for the hunting parties to return "before we can actually prepare the extent "of tonight's meal."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I actually did have a question, is it safe to be outside at night, or do you all generally stay indoors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But there are some nocturnal predators, "that we prefer to stay "within the protective arena of the village, "both at the watch of Terra "and the hunters upon their return, "who keep an eye in shifts throughout the night, "as well as Viridian and her sleepless talents with nature."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lukash, was Pono and Jaina a part of Terra's hunting party, just on a separate area of the island?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, there are multiple hunting parties, "but Terra oversees and organizes them before they go out, "as well as when the night is done, "calls them in and takes stock "of what they managed to acquire and haul."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please extend our thanks; they actually came to our aid as we were being besieged upon by those terrible beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "In the meantime, rest, and I will retrieve you "when the night has begun its planning cycle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But what time of day is it, Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have a handful of hours before sundown, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we free to wander the village?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I would recommend not wandering too far."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far is no longer safe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because it is, it's always been misty."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but some dangerous things use the mist "to not be seen, so maybe steer clear of it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this a thing we're doing now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, wow, so much to unpack!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This place is perfect for Traveler Con!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The village itself? What's the plan here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll need more than a week to prepare for the arrival of all of your... acolytes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, we can't have it here! They'll become villagers forever!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well that would be great, because the Traveler really doesn't want that many followers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but, two things; one, we should find out what this Vokodo is, and two, is anybody else worried about the ship?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, a little bit, I think we should probably let them know that they are expecting visitors, and they should probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or just hide, I feel like they're going to burn the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they burn the ship, they seem nice enough?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But that might also because they don't have the means to leave after they arrive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't mention that we have any crew, did we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send a message to Orly before I forget who Orly is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Caleb-- no, do that, but Caleb, you have a lot of paper, and writing implements, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am actually out of paper, and need some.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, I was going to ask to use some of it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're, like, always out of paper! We buy paper and then you're instantly out!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I was just thinking, maybe, in case we start losing our memories, maybe we should write down a quick log of everything that's happened to us since we've been here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I mean, I'm already doing that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh, that's a really, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For real, or is that Marisha?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Beau also really does that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, will you be in charge of that, Beau?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't walking and taking notes, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I know, but what if you do forget something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your brain can still be affect by things, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, why would you remember to find it in a book, then, after that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jeez, we should write a note to remind us to look in the book.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: From our two clerics, do either of you have any experience with like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Greater Restoration! I almost got it that time!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Do have it prepared? Because I don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, that makes sense that Clay would have it prepared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would that get rid of a loss of memory?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Wild Mother has also given me the ability to remove a poison or cure a disease, if this is a biological thing that this mist is doing, so we could try that on one of the-

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: -- like Modify Memory gone really wrong or something, you know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but what if-- what if maybe they wanted to forget?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was just thinking.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if they came, something brought them here because they wanted to forget things from their former life?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like, eventually, you're just going to believe that, no matter what you're told.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the percentages are just so high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean all of us came here because we wanted to forget?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And when you run out of precious things, what are you left with to give?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Than yourself? Maybe that's what-- Maybe that's what it takes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just eating at them, all the time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But it doesn't seem like most deities require material things?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not convinced this is a deity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got to be something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really want to meet him, though!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, we are going to have many questions unanswered until we find this Vokodo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it's just a giant avocado? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A giant av-- I can just see the drawing now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to send a message to Orly before I forget that I said I was going to send a message to Orly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they're not going to hide the ship!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well no, I'm just saying, like, if they come and they're like, "We're going to destroy the ship because nobody's around," then Orly and the crew can come out and be like, "Fuck you!" And then they can destroy the people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Orly and our crew? There's four people, and one of them's Marius!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get a response from Orly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we just go to dinner, what's the plan? We're going to, what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can give the villagers tarot card readings!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what that's going to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what we're going to do for the next few hours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're just living for the now, so I don't know if they would care about their future.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think their past and future is all in the volcano at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every card I pull is just a volcano! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't-- I think they'll agree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you remember how long he said it was to the-

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Shaded Tangle, do we remember how long he said it was to get to that door? From here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He said eight hours to get to the volcano.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight hours to the volcano, and the shady thing leads to, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to go to Heaven Falls!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But those were further, and then the Ruins are on the far north side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and Heaven Falls is at the north, too, so we could hit up both!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Ruins could also be, like, the ruins of an old hotel and convention center, could work out really well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if Heaven Falls is just like beautiful-- I mean, Heaven Falls, what if that's, like, the perfect place to hold a--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I assumed we would be location scouting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And find a proper place for your guests to arrive and stay whether it's this village or somewhere else, and you want to get the lay of the land before you talk with the big cheese?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I know, I got to tell him where to let everybody go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do we know how to direct people when they land? There could be beaches all around this island?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well we say-- if we are going to Heaven Falls, we go, "Land on the north side of the beach."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm going to tell the Traveler, and he's going to tell everyone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also can create some sort of a beacon for your fellow acolytes to come to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so it can shoot up in the air or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well yeah, I can put something in to-

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we can make a bonfire, at least, with smoke coming up and?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no wait, I have some stuff, too, that I should get, maybe we can have Marius run it up to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could just sail around the island.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He would lose his memory in two seconds and be stuck here forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, as long as he brought the stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can make you another banner, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Marius still hasn't killed anyone, has he?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he sucks, that's what I said!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plenty of reasonable people I know haven't killed anybody.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need to be better people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, but they were all bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, it's rough out there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we turn into giant birds, and we just grab everyone, and we fly, and that way we don't have to walk across the island? And we can get there super fast!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grab everyone, you mean us, grab us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we going to Wonder Twins this, is that the plan?

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: I don't know! I thought maybe if it was, like, a sad ghost, you know, like a Moaning Myrtle situation?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like it was-- wait, wait! Wasn't there some other creepy creature that was crying before that we-- in the wastes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was a moaning thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it as familiar as that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already burned a Turn Undead on this thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like I said, it has that hood, and the mouth is very-- this elongated, dragging jaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, we'll pick up on that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So excited. This is what I'm good at!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say its mouth was like a black void?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was just like this open--
